message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a great price considering the value it holds. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $1,350,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between its worth and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit higher than that.  I'm willing to come down to $1,375,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and what I'm willing to accept. Let me know if this works for you.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've carefully considered your proposal and I am willing to go up to $1,360,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
